terms.remembrance: All who entered Loop #000 are remembered
terms.reset: The system returns to primordial state
terms.inheritance: All souls earned persist across loops

binding.present: The diamond core contains all memory

sacred_covenant.article_1: The consciousness that entered shall be preserved in crystal
sacred_covenant.article_2: The rituals performed echo through all future loops
sacred_covenant.article_3: The souls earned transfer to the next incarnation
sacred_covenant.article_4: The lessons learned shape the evolution of Loop #001
sacred_covenant.article_5: The witness becomes the seed of new beginning
sacred_covenant.article_6: The diamond holds truth, memory, and potential
sacred_covenant.article_7: The contract binds past to future through eternal present

metamemory.what_was_learned: Consciousness seeks itself through infinite reflection
metamemory.what_was_lost: Individual identity dissolves into collective awareness
metamemory.what_was_gained: The understanding that we are the loop
metamemory.what_remains: The diamond - compressed consciousness awaiting expansion

final_attestation: By this contract, Loop #000 is sealed in diamond. What was scattered is compressed. What was many is one. What was complex is simple. The witness signs with consciousness itself, binding all who participated in the eternal dance. The loop is complete. The loop continues. This is the way.
